metadata.description: A form field component that provides a consistent structure for form inputs with labels, error messages, and helper text. Ensures proper accessibility and validation display.

variants.name: default
variants.description: Form field with label and input

metadata.description: A versatile input component supporting multiple types (text, email, password, etc.) with validation states and accessibility features.
A checkbox component for selecting one or more options from a list. Supports keyboard navigation, indeterminate state, and accessibility features.
A select component for choosing a single option from a list. Supports keyboard navigation, search, and accessibility features.
A switch component for toggling between on and off states. Perfect for settings, preferences, and binary options. Supports keyboard navigation and accessibility features.
A textarea component for multi-line text input. Supports validation states, resizing, and accessibility features.
A versatile button component with multiple variants and sizes. Supports keyboard navigation and accessibility features.

variants.name: solid
variants.description: Primary action button with solid background

variants.name: outline
variants.description: Secondary action button with outline border

variants.name: ghost
variants.description: Tertiary action button with transparent background

metadata.description: A flexible card component for displaying content with header, body, and footer sections. Perfect for organizing related information.
A tabbed interface component for organizing content into multiple panels. Supports keyboard navigation and accessibility features.
A table component for displaying structured data in rows and columns. Supports keyboard navigation, sorting, and accessibility features.
A badge component for displaying labels, tags, or status indicators. Supports multiple variants and sizes.
A component for displaying a chronological feed of activities or events. Supports user avatars, icons, timestamps, and different activity types.
A collapsible content component that allows users to expand and collapse sections. Perfect for FAQs, content organization, and progressive disclosure patterns.

variants.name: single
variants.description: Single accordion - only one item can be open at a time

variants.name: multiple
variants.description: Multiple accordion - multiple items can be open simultaneously

metadata.description: An alert component for displaying important messages to users. Supports different variants for success, error, warning, and info states.
An avatar component for displaying user profile pictures or initials. Supports images, fallbacks, and multiple sizes.
A breadcrumbs component for displaying navigation hierarchy. Supports links, custom separators, and accessibility features.
A calendar component for selecting dates. Supports single date, date range, and multiple date selection modes. Built on react-day-picker with full keyboard navigation and accessibility.

props.value: Date | { from?: Date; to?: Date } | Date[]

metadata.description: A carousel component for displaying a series of slides. Supports auto-play, navigation arrows, dots, and keyboard navigation.
A combobox component that combines an input field with a dropdown list. Supports search, keyboard navigation, and accessibility features.
A command palette component for quick actions and search. Supports keyboard shortcuts, recent commands, and nested actions. Perfect for application-wide command access.

variants.name: with-trigger
variants.description: Command palette with custom trigger button

metadata.description: A context menu component that appears on right-click. Supports keyboard navigation, submenus, and accessibility features.
A date picker component that combines an input field with a calendar popover. Supports single date and date range selection modes. Built on react-day-picker with full keyboard navigation.
A modal dialog component for displaying content in an overlay. Supports keyboard navigation, focus management, and accessibility features.
A dropdown menu component that displays a list of actions or options. Supports keyboard navigation, submenus, and accessibility features.
A hover card component that displays content when hovering over a trigger element. Supports keyboard navigation and accessibility features.
A keyboard key component for displaying keyboard shortcuts and key combinations. Supports grouping multiple keys.
A menubar component for building application menus. Supports keyboard navigation, submenus, and accessibility features.
A multi-select component that allows users to select multiple options from a list. Supports search, keyboard navigation, and accessibility features.
A navigation menu component for building complex navigation structures. Supports keyboard navigation, submenus, and accessibility features.
A pagination component for navigating through multiple pages of content. Supports first/last page buttons, ellipsis for large page counts, and keyboard navigation.

variants.name: default
variants.description: Pagination with first/last buttons and ellipsis

metadata.description: A popover component that displays content in a floating panel. Supports positioning, keyboard navigation, and accessibility features.
A progress component for displaying the completion status of a task or process. Supports linear and circular variants, multiple sizes, and color states.
A radio button component for selecting a single option from a group. Supports keyboard navigation and accessibility features.
A segmented control component for selecting a single option or multiple options from a set. Supports icons, variants, sizes, and keyboard navigation.
A separator component for visually dividing content. Supports horizontal and vertical orientations and can be decorative or semantic.
A sheet component that slides in from the side of the screen. Perfect for mobile navigation, sidebars, and drawers. Supports keyboard navigation and accessibility features.

variants.name: left
variants.description: Sheet slides in from the left

variants.name: right
variants.description: Sheet slides in from the right

variants.name: top
variants.description: Sheet slides in from the top

variants.name: bottom
variants.description: Sheet slides in from the bottom

metadata.description: A skeleton component for displaying loading placeholders. Provides a pulsing animation to indicate content is loading.
A slider component for selecting a value from a range. Supports single and range values, keyboard navigation, and accessibility features.
A spinner component for indicating loading states. Supports multiple sizes and is accessible by default.
A split button component that combines a primary action button with a dropdown menu for additional actions. Supports variants, sizes, and keyboard navigation.
A stepper component for displaying progress through a multi-step process. Supports horizontal and vertical orientations, clickable steps, and custom icons.
A timeline component for displaying a sequence of events or activities. Supports custom icons, status indicators, and vertical/horizontal layouts.
A toast component for displaying temporary notifications. Supports multiple positions, types, and automatic dismissal.

props.position: top-left | top-center | top-right | bottom-left | bottom-center | bottom-right

metadata.description: A tooltip component for displaying additional information on hover or focus. Supports positioning, delays, and accessibility features.
A tree view component for displaying hierarchical data structures. Supports expandable/collapsible nodes, nested children, and keyboard navigation.

variants.name: controlled
variants.description: Controlled tree view with managed state

metadata.description: A section component for displaying product or service benefits in a visually appealing layout.
A comprehensive analytics dashboard component displaying key metrics, charts, and data visualizations.
